title: President Donald J. Trump’s Administration is Providing Support to Those Impacted by Hurricane Florence – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
September 19, 2018
Incredible job being done by FEMA, first responders, law enforcement and all. Thank you!
						President Donald J. Trump					BOOTS ON THE GROUND: The Trump Administration mobilized thousands of Federal employees who are working to protect lives and restore power impacted by Hurricane Florence. GOVERNMENT-WIDE RESPONSE: The Trump Administration is conducting an ongoing and Government-wide effort response effort in the wake of Hurricane Florence. PREPARED FOR FLORENCE: President Trump and his Administration were prepared for Hurricane Florence, prestaging numerous resources and planning Federal assistance.
